Member Function Documentation

void CelsiusUnit::convertToNeutral ( long  inputNumArgs,
t_atom *  inputAtoms,
long *  outputNumArgs,
double *  output 
) [virtual]

Converts from an actual unit to a 'neutral' unit that can be interpreted by other units within this dataspace. This must be defined by a sub-class.

Implements DataspaceUnit.
